## Steps to reproduce
- Open new terminal on Linux
- run `powershell`
- `import-module ./build.psm1 -Force`
- Start-PSxUnit -Verbose 

Note: same could be applicable to other functions from `build.psm1`
## Expected behavior

test run
## Actual behavior

error that `dotnet` is unknown command
## Environment data

<!-- If running the latest released version, specify the version, i.e. -->

v0.4.0

<!-- If running you own build, please fill in the results of the following commands: -->

``` powershell
> $PSVersionTable

```

``` sh
$ dotnet --info

That's the thing. dotnet is not there by default :)

$ git rev-parse HEAD; git status

58425bbcc0c7f5845d0b9230b1dceb7d24cceb03
```
